sentences.sentence: Our condolences go to his wife and family.
sentences.translation: 向他的妻子和家人谨致吊慰之意。

sentences.sentence: He expressed his condolences to the families of the people who died in the incident.
sentences.translation: 他向那次事故遇难者家属表达了哀悼。

sentences.sentence: A lot of people hurried to Changsha to express their condolences over his death.
sentences.translation: 很多人赶赴长沙哀悼他的逝世。
